channel.title: Windows Vista Java Problem- NOTHING WORKS!
channel.description:
Hey;
I am using Windows Vista.
I have tried every tool/guide on here, and nothing works.
I have JDK and JRE. When I open a server it just opens and closes.
Can anyone help me?
Regards, Matt

item.title: Windows Vista Java Problem- NOTHING WORKS!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

I think gnomez is right, but if you’re also talking about the glitch where you walk and then freeze, turn your .bat into a .exe with a bat to exe program, and it works (at least for my server). For now just type “pause” in the end, like he said.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista Java Problem- NOTHING WORKS!

item.title: Windows Vista Java Problem- NOTHING WORKS!
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

edit run.bat and remove the exit at the end and put a pause there then post what it says

Read full topic
